channel.title: Newbie <- is making a server and needs help!
channel.description:
So hi. I recently made a server. But I've got alot to learn. 1. There are lists for admins/members/mods/banned people/etc. - if you edit them, how do you add a name to them , just putting the name in it doesn't work. ( Again, I am new in Java. ) 2. Editting stats : When I edit stats to 99 or whatever, they seem to be different when i login. also the --/* * is stat i want to have, it looks like I need to fill in another code, to change it. Help needed!
Thanks.

item.title: Newbie <- is making a server and needs help!

item.description:
@Foxxx wrote:

ooh the exp… Dummie me, thanks alot.

item.title: Newbie <- is making a server and needs help!
item.dc:creator: @strengthxlx strengthxlx
item.description:
@strengthxlx wrote:

You have to fill in the level, and exp, so if you wanted 99/99 it’d look like

99 13800000

Read full topic

item.title: Newbie <- is making a server and needs help!
item.dc:creator: @Foxxx Foxxx
item.description:
@Foxxx wrote:

So hi. I recently made a server. But I’ve got alot to learn.

  1. There are lists for admins/members/mods/banned people/etc. - if you edit them, how do you add a name to them , just putting the name in it doesn’t work. ( Again, I am new in Java. )
  2. Editting stats : When I edit stats to 99 or whatever, they seem to be different when i login. also the --/*
  • is stat i want to have, it looks like I need to fill in another code, to change it. Help needed!

Thanks.
